extendedInfo.description: Are you a super fan of jewels-matching games? If the answer is yes, Jewels Dash is the game that you must have. Unlike the classic jewels-matching game such as Bejeweled, it has a lot of new features (just like diamond dash on iOS) to make the game much more interesting and challenging. âââââ How to play âââââ - Simply tap your finger on any matching jewels to match as many colorful diamonds as possible before the time runs out;- Try to make the match as quick as possible, then you can enjoy the best feeling of continuous Combo and awarding scores.âââââ Highlighted Features âââââ  - Three game modes, each has its own attractive point, to keep the players' feeling of freshness;- New power ups, to make the game more exciting and interesting;- Bright and vibrant graphics & effects;- It is a game that is accessible for people of all ages. There is no limit to the amount of fun that can be had in Jewels-Dash! We believe that everyone is a gamer at heart and that games are a great source of joy and relaxation. So Ezjoy always try to make the games easy and joy. For Jewels Dash, we want to make it the best one-tap matching style game on Android and your 5-star reviews keep us inspired and motivated. Visit m.ezjoygame.com from your Android device to see the whole gamelist.Enormous thanks to everyone for their playing, feedback, and support.==========================Ezjoy is the name behind Marble Blast, Jewels Maze, Empire VS Orcs, Bird Blast, Bubble Pop, Devil Hunter, Ice Breaker, Jewels Miner and many other top popular games.==========================

reviews.title: COOL
reviews.comment: This is better than Dimand Dash because on Dimand Dash you only get 5 lives but on this you get aout 50 lives . IT\'S COOL . And by the way the cube earea is like the bonus room .
reviews.author: Leah Farley

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very interested game i like...easy to play and it is cool..
reviews.author: jelyn opanto

reviews.title: OK but...
reviews.comment: What are the rules and or objectives??? Without them it\'s pretty much an average or less time waster.
reviews.author: Carroll Savage

reviews.title: Great game!!
reviews.comment: I can say its very addicting I love how u get more lives,an I just started playing an already I like it...Thumbs Up.
reviews.author: melinda toliver

reviews.title: Fun but
reviews.comment: There were no instructions on what to do and how to do it. But once you get the hang of it it can be fun for everyone.
reviews.author: Bill Wallace

reviews.comment: Love it! I really like how it gives you more than a minute to complete a level. I have so much with this game.
reviews.author: Tori Coleman

reviews.title: Great change of pace on jewel game
reviews.comment: I like the different types of play, although I wish there was an untimed play mode
reviews.author: Nicole Royal

reviews.title: Enjoyment
reviews.comment: I can\'t put my phone down. I have to keep going and going to beat my own scores
reviews.author: Sugar Waters

reviews.title: Htc one
reviews.comment: Its nice to start out with 30 lives unlike u do in diamind dash, but its hard to line up the gems if they arent in a row goin up & down. Game also freezes alot. I deleted the app & wouldnt reccomend it to anyone. Diamond dash is a much better game!!
reviews.author: Jessica House

reviews.title: Pop
reviews.comment: Would give this game 5 stars if it wasn\'t for all the pop ups. I guess thats the price of a great game though
reviews.author: Cathie Marsh

reviews.title: Great game!!!!!!
reviews.comment: LOVE THIS BETTER THAN DIAMOND DASH,  LESS BORING!!!   DOES GREAT ON MY FUSION II,  ANY IMPROVEMENTS,  IM ALL FOR!!!  J. Knode   VA
reviews.author: Jeana Knode

reviews.comment: The game is great for older players and it helps pass time. It also keeps your intrest\tGreat game
reviews.author: Kyra White

reviews.comment: I\'VE BEEN PLAYING FOR THIS GAME FOR 15 HOURS I BLAME THE GOOGLE PLAY STORE FOR MY MESSED UP SLEEPING PATTERN
reviews.author: Sofia Rivas

reviews.title: GOOD GAME!!!
reviews.comment: I am enjoying this very much...
reviews.author: Barbara Stanford

reviews.title: Jewels dash
reviews.comment: I love dis game. Jus downloaded it yesterday can\'t stop playing.  Very addictive.
reviews.author: Shannon Jallow

reviews.comment: A great game that will test your eye site and speed to macth 3 or more jewls\tNothing to comment
reviews.author: Tim Rogers

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Im loving this game..its kinda like diamond dash..lol
reviews.author: Mahogany brown

reviews.title: Makes time vanish!
reviews.comment: Bright colors remind you of the Good old arcade games rendered today colored, glimmering and eye candy, not even mentioning the many styles, this game is bound to make you experience happy times! Great one, highly recommend!
reviews.author: \303\211milia Tokes

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Needs a rules option to make sure gamers have a clear understanding of how to improve and utilize all the ways the game operates.
reviews.author: Kevin Grantlin

reviews.title: Very exciting
reviews.comment: I would recommend it highly
reviews.author: Lovie Harris
